bill_payment.title: bill_payment.sub_title
Bill payment instructions: The steps may vary from bank to bank, but usually it's a similar process. You can also find an instructions on your bank website. Please, follow these steps.

bill_payment.title: bill_payment.steps.step_1
Bill payment instructions: Login to your Online Banking and go to the Bill Payment Section

bill_payment.title: bill_payment.steps.step_3
Bill payment instructions: Type Remitbee in the search field and Select it.

bill_payment.title: bill_payment.steps.step_4
Bill payment instructions: Enter your account number - your Remitbee Account No.

bill_payment.title: bill_payment.steps.step_6
Bill payment instructions: Next, enter amount of your transfer and review all the transfer details.

bill_payment.title: bill_payment.steps.step_7
Bill payment instructions: Click Submit to complete your payment.

bill_payment.title: bill_payment.funding_time
Bill payment instructions: Please allow us up to 1 business day to deposit funds into your wallet.

bill_payment.title: bill_payment.note
Bill payment instructions: You're all set! Once you’ve added Remitbee as a bill payee with your bank, you can easily use this payment method in the future.

bill_payment.title: interac_e_transfer.steps.step_1
Bill payment instructions: E-transfers done between 10 am-7 pm EST are credited within same day.

bill_payment.title: interac_e_transfer.steps.step_2
Bill payment instructions: Login to your online banking and send a new Interac e-Transfer using the data displayed below.

bill_payment.title: notify_steps.notify
Bill payment instructions: We will notify you through email when the money is loaded in your wallet.

bill_payment.title: notify_steps.note
Bill payment instructions: Note: It may take up to 24 hours for the funds to be credited to your wallet.

bill_payment.title: continue_button_title
Bill payment instructions: Send me an email with instructions
